news_header: Future VAT reforms will hold platforms accountable for collecting VAT if sellers do not. Ecofin has agreed on significant changes to the VAT system to combat fraud and improve efficiency.
news_text: Ecofin has reached a political agreement on VAT reform, which includes platforms being responsible for collecting VAT if sellers fail to do so. This aims to combat tax fraud, enhance system efficiency, and reduce competition distortions. Key changes include real-time digital VAT reporting for EU trade, increased platform liability for accommodation and ride services, and a common VAT registration in the EU to modernize the VAT system and promote digitalization.
